title: Mephisto's Lair
data:
**Mephisto's Lair** is a special level in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"). It is generated between levels 2 and 8 of [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Map

| --------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Location                                            | Level 2–8 of [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom") |
| [Bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones")                        | Yes                                                |
| [Mappable](/wiki/Magic_mapping "Magic mapping")     | Yes                                                |
| [Teleportable](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation") | Yes                                                |
| [Diggable floor](/wiki/Digging "Digging")           | Yes                                                |
| [Diggable walls](/wiki/Digging "Digging")           | No                                                 |

[Mephistopholes](/index.php?title=Mephistopholes\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mephistopholes (page does not exist)") & stands on the downstair guarded by a [pit fiend](/wiki/Pit_fiend "Pit fiend") [&](/wiki/Pit_fiend "Pit fiend") named The Left Horn and a pit fiend named The Right Horn. There are also [hezrou](/wiki/Hezrou "Hezrou") [&](/wiki/Hezrou "Hezrou") and [lava demons](/wiki/Lava_demon "Lava demon") & at the positions shown above.

Additionally, there are four lava demons, one [magma elemental](/wiki/Magma_elemental "Magma elemental"), eleven random [&](/wiki/%26 "&"), twelve random [objects](/wiki/Object "Object"), ten [land mines](/wiki/Land_mine "Land mine"), four [fire traps](/wiki/Fire_trap "Fire trap") and five random traps scattered around the level.

The level is unlit.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

- [SpliceHack/Special levels](/wiki/SpliceHack/Special_levels "SpliceHack/Special levels")

Mephisto's Lair

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Mephisto's Lair is a special level in SpliceHack. It is generated between levels 2 and 8 of Gehennom.[1]

Map

Mephisto's Lair
Location Level 2–8 of
Gehennom
Bones Yes
Mappable Yes
Teleportable Yes
Diggable floor Yes
Diggable walls No

Mephistopholes & stands on the downstair guarded by a pit fiend & named The Left Horn and a pit fiend named The Right Horn. There are also hezrou & and lava demons & at the positions shown above.

Additionally, there are four lava demons, one magma elemental, eleven random &, twelve random objects, ten land mines, four fire traps and five random traps scattered around the level.

The level is unlit.[2]

[[Mephistopholes]] {{magenta|&}} stands on the downstair guarded by a [[pit fiend]] {{msl|pit fiend}} named The Left Horn and a pit fiend named The Right Horn. There are also [[hezrou]] {{msl|hezrou}} and [[lava demon]]s {{red|&}} at the positions shown above. Additionally, there are four lava demons, one [[magma elemental]], eleven random [[&|{{white|&}}]], twelve random [[object]]s, ten [[land mine]]s, four [[fire trap]]s and five random traps scattered around the level. The level is unlit.https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/dat/mephisto.lua == See also == * [[SpliceHack/Special levels]] == References == [[Category:SpliceHack special levels]]
